comment:
"Soprano C, we like to keep it on a high note
It's levels to it, you and I know"

i can't ever really talk about how i feel, i cringe out, but with you ik i can always speak my mind, you make me feel at ease, drop my defences
u are one of those very few friends ik are for life.
love ya, mama hen <3.
name: Harshath Gurrala

comment: Mawayaa.. Mana gang ki dorikina oka pedda animuthyam mawa nuvu, Nuvu unav ante akada edo oka fun unate, chess nerchukoni edo oka roju ninnu beat chestha undu. Tagina tarvatha neetho pette muchatluu chala miss aitha mawa. tagadam aina chadavadam aina sports aina dance aina edi aina mawaye number one
name: Karthikeya Madishetty

comment: Amma, avakai, Allu bhAAi, shashank mavvayya hugs ivvi chalu ee life kii. Entha kastam vochina kaani oka manchi sleep vesthe set aipothadi ani nerpinchav. Nii smile inka hugs tho entha baada ayina sare seconds lo marchipotham. Will definitely miss you raa❤️
name: Harshith

comment: Mama, You are the one that I lookup to when I am in trouble because you are the big brother of mine. I had a fruitful time during online mode with our small group and later in PP.
name: Avinash Bellamkonda

comment: Nuvu good boy entra 🤦‍♂️.. edho radham ani vacha kani aa good boy ani chudangane mind dobindhi 😂.. kani Baa ❤️❤️❤️.. aa online times lo manam vese sollu.. Exams ki syllabus split chesukodalu.. same team same team ani Ludo aduthu 😂.. asal cheppukuntu pothe oka book ye rayochu.. Love you Baa ❤
name: Sathvik Reddy Govindu

comment: The mavayya we got in campus. BhAAi, sesi, mavayya inka enni perlu tho pilusthamo😂 luv ur positivity mama. Online lo message pedithe enduku pettav ananduku sorry🤣. Rajamundry vachinappudu pedda vindhu kavali. All the best mama...mana bond eppudu ilage undali!!
name: Snehith chinta

comment:
Nuvvu football choosthey maku heartattack vastay.
Ne hugs ni matram marchiponu mawa 🥰.302 ki teddy ra nuvvu 🥺🥺.Stress relief ki ball kuda akarledhu mawa nuvvu vuntey .Nuvvu taaginappudu(H20) iche entertainment was lub I say😉😉.Anyway touch lo vundu mawa .
name: Sreenath Lakkakula

comment: U r a torchbearer unlike United
name: Koppula Shashivardhan

comment: Love you mamayya. Will definitely miss you the most. A hug from this guy will instantly make any problem disappear. The sweetest smile you can find.
name: Shankar Nakka

comment:
Rey mama... Thanks for being there for me. Inni rojulu koncham busy unna kaani ninnu eppudu marchipoledhu ra... 😁
Nee lanti sweet, soft and handsome friend ni evaru vadhulukuntaaru cheppu... 😉
Life lo ekkuva stress teesukoku. You will definitely achieve somthing big eventually. Keep working hard..
name: Siddartha Chennareddy

comment: Bhaai no words only hugsss... Finally okate word nee high energy ni alane continue chestu vundu.
name: Veeramalla Varun

comment: Mayya nuvu football aadina step esina Hero la untav maass vibe ni create chesthav. Always Love you Mayya.
name: Raghavendra Buchammagari

comment: I wish I had met you earlier mahn. You are one of those persons who will always go that extra mile for their friends. I will miss our chats on football. Lets hope both Barca and Man U find their glory the next time we meet !!
name: Arjun A

comment: A joyful person. Great company to have a drink. Bad football player😂.
name: P.Jaya Vardhan

comment: You are a better winger than Antony and Rashford combined
name: Sai Abhinav

comment:
